dct_description_sm: Allegorical map of Europe, Africa and Asia with four windheads. Relief shown pictorially. Title from: Shirley, p. 71. Also known as the Wittenberg world map. Used in editions of Luther's Wittenberg Bible. Map set in a page of text headed "Daniel, [p.] 113."
